name: A Black Holey Christmas
description:
This is a ridiculous Christmas-themed interactive short story I made to soothe the soul in these times of strife. All innocent fun, I swear. 

Oh, but I should note that it could get gory, but that all depends on you. I mean if it gets gory, that definitely sounds like a you problem, just saying. It's all just text anyway so if it bothers you, you can stop reading or go back and make... better choices I suppose. But really, if it gets gory, I'm not really sure how that happened since I just wrote a simple, wholesome Christmas story in space. Honestly :)

There are no images and no music or sound effects of any kind. This is just a plain, boring interactive story, of the sci-fi and Christmas variety. 

There are 5 different main endings, but for 3 of the endings there are 4 different variations in how it plays out depending on your choices, so it may seem like there are more than 5 endings, and there sort of are, but there are 5 distinct endings if that makes sense.

Play it in the browser on this page, or download it and play it in your browser in a separate tab.

Happy holidays :)

(Cover image photo by Max McKinnon on Unsplash)
